Uses of Interface
com.roscopeco.moxy.api.MoxyVerifier

  • Packages that use MoxyVerifier 
    Package Description
    com.roscopeco.moxy
    Moxy is a Java mocking/spying framework, similar in principle to other mocking libraries.
    com.roscopeco.moxy.api
    API for Moxy.

    • Uses of MoxyVerifier in com.roscopeco.moxy

      Methods in com.roscopeco.moxy that return MoxyVerifier 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MoxyVerifier Moxy.assertMock(InvocationRunnable invocation)
      Starts verification of the mock invocation in the supplied lambda expression using the currently-set (or default) MoxyEngine.
      static MoxyVerifier Moxy.assertMock(MoxyEngine engine, InvocationRunnable invocation)
      Starts verification of the mock invocation in the supplied lambda expression using the specified MoxyEngine.

    • Uses of MoxyVerifier in com.roscopeco.moxy.api

      Methods in com.roscopeco.moxy.api that return MoxyVerifier 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MoxyVerifier MoxyEngine.assertMock(InvocationRunnable invocation)
      Starts verification of the mock invocation in the supplied lambda expression.
      MoxyVerifier MoxyVerifier.didntThrow(Class<? extends Throwable> throwable)
      Verify the mocked method didn't throw an exception of type throwable.
      MoxyVerifier MoxyVerifier.didntThrow(Throwable throwable)
      Verify the mocked method didn't throw the given throwable instance.
      MoxyVerifier MoxyVerifier.didntThrowAnyException()
      Verify the mocked method didn't throw any exceptions.
      MoxyVerifier MoxyVerifier.wasCalled()
      Verify that the mock method was called at least once, with the arguments specified in the call.
      MoxyVerifier MoxyVerifier.wasCalled(int times)
      Verify that the mock method was called exactly times, with the arguments specified in the call.
      MoxyVerifier MoxyVerifier.wasCalledAtLeast(int times)
      Verify the mock method was called at least times.
      MoxyVerifier MoxyVerifier.wasCalledAtMost(int times)
      Verify the mock method was called at most times.
      MoxyVerifier MoxyVerifier.wasCalledOnce()
      Verify the mock method was called exactly once.
      MoxyVerifier MoxyVerifier.wasCalledTwice()
      Verify the mock method called exactly twice.
      MoxyVerifier MoxyVerifier.wasNotCalled()
      Verify that the mock method was not called.
